title: Hulk
writer: Stan Lee, Jack Kirby, James Schamus
short_cast: Eric Bana, Jennifer Connelly, Nick Nolte, Sam Elliott, Josh Lucas, Paul Kersey, Cara Buono, Lou Ferrigno, Kevin Rankin, Celia Weston, Todd Tesen, Stan Lee

desc: Researcher Bruce Banner's failed experiments cause him to mutate into a powerful and savage green-skinned hulk when he loses control of his emotions.
